Form 990, Part VI, Line 19: Other Organization Documents Publicly Available
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Governing documents, conflict of interest policy, and financial statements are made available to the public on request.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 15b: Compensation Review and Approval Process for Officers and Key Employees
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The compensation of the General Manager is determined by using comparability data and is approved by the Board of Directors. The compensation of other officers and key employees is determined using comparability data,is inititally approved and recommended by the General Manager, and is then given final approval by the Board of Directors.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 12c: Explanation of Monitoring and Enforcement of Conflicts
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: A questionnaire is sent annually to all employees requesting information regarding possible conflicts of interest. These questionnaires are reviewed by the General Manager.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 11: Form 990 Review Process
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The Manager of Accounting and Financial Services provides the independent auditors with information used in preparing the Form 990. The completed form is then reviewed by the Manager of Accounting and Financial Services and by the General Manager. The General Manager then presents the Form 990 to the Board of Directors for their review.
